About

You bought a boat to go sailing.

Not to spend time managing tradespeople, doing maintenance or finding people to crew.

That's where Jeeves Marine comes in.

We can save you time and money by managing your boat for you.

Trades liaison

Negotiating rates, overseeing work

Race prep

Race paperwork, getting your boat race-ready, sourcing crew

Cruising prep

Arranging detailing, stocking provisions
